Sentencas: Thin-film-based solid oxide fuel cells with reduced electrolyte thickness have been developed in an effort to lower the operating temperatures and increase the cost competitiveness and lifetime of the devices.
Titulo: Cathodic electrochemical deposition: a new strategy to enhance the activity and stability of silver cathodes for thin-film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Although silver has gained a considerable amount of attention as a cathode material with excellent oxygen reduction activity at lower temperatures, thermal instability due to agglomeration is a major disadvantage associated with the use of silver.
Titulo: Cathodic electrochemical deposition: a new strategy to enhance the activity and stability of silver cathodes for thin-film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Many oxide coating methods have been suggested to overcome this problem, but the results remain unsatisfactory.
Titulo: Cathodic electrochemical deposition: a new strategy to enhance the activity and stability of silver cathodes for thin-film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, we propose cathodic electrochemical deposition (CELD) as a new strategy to improve the activity and stability of silver electrodes.
Titulo: Cathodic electrochemical deposition: a new strategy to enhance the activity and stability of silver cathodes for thin-film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Pr-doped ceria is coated onto a nanoporous silver film by CELD and analyzed by electron microscopy, mass spectrometry, and X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Cathodic electrochemical deposition: a new strategy to enhance the activity and stability of silver cathodes for thin-film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: AC impedance spectroscopy of symmetric cells (electrode vertical bar electrolyte vertical bar electrode) reveals that only a few minutes of CELD increases the electrode activity by approximately 33 times and achieves outstanding durability with no degradation, even at 550 degrees C for 50 hours.
Titulo: Cathodic electrochemical deposition: a new strategy to enhance the activity and stability of silver cathodes for thin-film solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrolyte-supported single cells are also fabricated to demonstrate the enhanced performance of the Ag electrode created via the ceria overcoats.
Titulo: Cathodic electrochemical deposition: a new strategy to enhance the activity and stability of silver cathodes for thin-film solid oxide fuel cells
